entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Vanier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this evening then to freezing rain later this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
